prompts: Create a dragon-type Pokemon with elegant features and a shimmering silver body.
Show me a legendary Pokemon that embodies time and space with iridescent scales.
Imagine a unique Pokemon with a sleek, aerodynamic shape and mystical powers.
Design a powerful, mythical creature with a futuristic appearance and celestial colors.
Generate a Pokemon that resembles a dragon, combining elegance and strength in its design.
Give me an intricate Pokemon with a blend of white and purple hues, radiating majesty.
Make a Pokemon that stands out with its distinct features and a mesmerizing color palette.
